settings.message_text: ENJOY FREE SHIPPING AUSTRALIA WIDE WHEN PURCHASING OUR ARC, HALO, LUX AND MILOS BASINS.

settings.title: EXPLORE OUR HANDCRAFTED RANGE OF CONCRETE BASINS
OUR FOCUS ON SUSTAINABILITY
settings.text:
At Concrete Nation, we understand the importance of being socially responsible.

When we launched our brand eight years ago, our goal was to offer ethical, high-quality products that were safe for our clients and the environment.

settings.title: UNSURE WHICH BESPOKE HUE WILL WORK BEST WITHIN YOUR PROJECT?
THIS WEEK'S MUST HAVE
settings.richtext: In a disposable society, we pride ourselves on creating timeless, quality investment pieces that work back with any interior or building style and really do become the hero of a space.

settings.title: MEET OUR PETITE VALENCIA BATH
settings.text: EXPLORE OUR CONCRETE FREESTANDING BATHS HERE

settings.testimonial_text: "We loved working with Concrete Nation to showcase their beautiful products in our latest project. The selection process was easy, from receiving samples to looking up all the product information on the website, to delivery. We love the products and they add so much character to our home"
"We included the Tropez pedestal basin in our powder room and I'm obsessed. It's a piece of art. The colour is sublime and the organic finish is really special."

“ We found CN through scrolling in our feed on Instagram as we were renovating our abode and fell in love with their uniqueness and hand made craft. Outside of us finding our dream products, Kate, Jason and their amazing team made us feel comfortable from the moment we walked into their showroom to the final installation. CN have made our future projects look so exciting and we absolutely can not wait to work with the team again.”

settings.title: AS SEEN IN DOMINO MAGAZINE USA
settings.text: Our statement freestanding Tropez basin’s clean curves caught the eye of celebrated US designer, Leanne Ford. We created a Tropez in Soft Gold for Leanne’s home in Pennsylvania and her HGTV show, Restored by the Fords for a striking bathroom revamp.

settings.richtext: Our statement freestanding Como basin's clean curves caught the eye of celebrated US designer, Leanne Ford. We created a Como Basin in Greenstone for Leanne’s most recent project, The Kerr Home and her HGTV show, Restored by the Fords for a striking bathroom revamp. Shop our Como Here.
